name: IPFS File Downloader
description: Downloads files from IPFS networks using public gateways with configurable size limits and extension filtering.
author: @@official.shinkai

allowed_extensions.description: Optional comma-separated list of allowed file extensions. If provided, ONLY these extensions will be allowed, overriding the default list. Default : '.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif, .webp, .svg, .bmp, .tiff, .ico, .heic, .pdf, .txt, .md, .rtf, .csv, .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, .epub, .json, .xml, .yaml, .html, .css, .mp3, .wav, .ogg, .m4a, .flac, .mp4, .webm, .mkv, .mov, .avi, .zip, .tar, .gz, .rar, .7z'

max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size in megabytes allowed for download. Default : 50

base_filename.description: Optional base filename (without extension) to rename the downloaded files. Suffixes (_1, _2, etc.) will be added if multiple files.

folder_path.description: Optional absolute local path to save a duplicate copy of the downloaded files.

ipfs_urls.description: List of IPFS URLs to download. Can be 'ipfs://<cid>' or gateway URLs.

local_saved_ipfs_files_paths.description: List of absolute paths to the saved files.
